title: UPENDNOW
description: Upendnow is a powerful platform designed as a co-pilot for content creators. It automates the entire video production process, allowing creators to effortlessly generate creative briefs, story scripts, storyboards, and even music. By leveraging advanced AI models, it streamlines the production workflow and enhances creative output. The platform is fully automated, enabling content creators to save time and focus on their craft.
features: Real-Time Data Updates (Data: XML to JSON conversion for faster updates)
Personalization (Targeted recommendations for better user retention & sales)
benefits: Enhanced Content Creation Efficiency: The project can significantly streamline the video production process by automating tasks such as scriptwriting and image generation. This can reduce production time and costs.
Improved Content Quality: By providing in-depth video analysis and relevant web searches, the project can help creators produce more engaging and informative content.
New Revenue Streams: The project could potentially be monetized through subscriptions, premium features, or partnerships with content creators.

Competitive Advantage: For businesses that rely heavily on video content, this project could provide a competitive advantage by enabling them to produce high-quality content more efficiently than their competitors.

title: Toyota Hilux OM
description: We developed a customer support app for Toyota Hilux vehicles, featuring an AI-powered Owner’s Manual (OM). This solution enhances user experience by providing instant support, troubleshooting assistance, and relevant information through a multilingual chatbot, voice assistant, and advanced search features. Our system enables faster issue resolution, improved accessibility, and personalized recommendations, making vehicle ownership more convenient and efficient.

title: CHATBOT 23
description: The AI-powered chatbot is designed to revolutionize customer support by adapting to business needs. Fully configurable, it can be tailored to meet any specific requirement, enhancing efficiency and personalization in customer interactions.

title: OCR on Tickets
description: OCR on Tickets focuses on developing a multi-LLM chatbot solution that extracts and processes information from handwritten tickets using Optical Character Recognition (OCR) technology. Leveraging OpenAI Vision for image-to-text conversion, the system decodes and interprets handwritten content with high accuracy. By integrating Generative AI and Prompt Engineering, the solution enhances data extraction and automates workflows. The FastAPI framework ensures efficient backend processing, while Base64 is utilized for secure image handling.
features: Real-Time Data Updates (Data: XML to JSON conversion for faster updates)
Personalization (Targeted recommendations for better user retention & sales)

title: Room Condition and Category Prediction
description: The Room Condition and Category Prediction project uses AI to analyze room images in Base64 format, categorizing them into 40+ room types. It also assesses room conditions, such as age, wall damage, and cleanliness. The solution integrates OpenAI Vision, Generative AI, and prompt engineering, with a tech stack that includes Flask and Base64 encoding for accurate classification and analysis.
features: Real-Time Data Updates (Data: XML to JSON conversion for faster updates)
Personalization (Targeted recommendations for better user retention & sales)
